title: Please help :( bugsplat.dll not found
body:
I haven't been able to play league in months because when I try to open league, I can't see the launcher at all. It pops up with the banner and then it closes out but the patcher/launcher appear. As far as I can tell from my task manager, the patcher is actually open, but I don't see a window and can't open it via task manager. About half of the time, if I leave it for more than 30 minutes, it will pop up and say "bugsplat.dll not found". 

I have tried reinstalling the client completely. I have tried manually replacing bugsplat. I have tried manually replacing bugsplat and reinstalling and the other way around. I have completely purged any riot games/league of legends files from my computer and reinstalled. I have reinstalled and let the client run for hours without touching the computer. I have tried everything. I have tried... :(

replies.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJct9rJFC-U

the video is in spanish but it got my client working again.  the link to download is in the vidoe description. 

Basically download the bugsplatt.dII file and put in in the same folder as your client, then start the client and it works. 1 minute fix.   download the file from the "browser" option. 

youre welcome bro.

You may fixed it but if u didnt here is how i fixed(Sorry for bad english)
1.Go in your computer
2.Write bugsplat in that right corner
3.find BugSplat.dll
4.Copy it
5.Go to your lol location and paste it
Enjoy your game
thanks me later

I have the same problem but i just download a new bugsplat on the file and it works I suggest this link http://www.mediafire.com/file/sgdn8nj1dn4zmdk/BugSplat+%281%29.dll but rename it to bugsplat.dll and if it doesn't work I dont know whats the problem of your computer m8

I have recently had the same problem Bugsplay.dll missing. You or internet security has probably deleted the file. i spent a week searching for a solution downloading all sorts of stuff which lead to dead ends. i found a solution which has worked for me and i'm able to play league once again. I used a 16GB jumpdrive just to be safe to make sure the game would fit


You will need a second computer or a friends computer to help you with this, Also a jump drive or stick with 8GB space.

First uninstall all files to do with league off of your computer .
You then need a jump drive with at least 8GB
Use the jump drive on your friends pc or another PC that has a fully patched league of legends that is currently working and copy the (Riot Games file) in the C:Drive and paste into the jump drive.
Then insert jumpdrive in your computer and transfer file from jump drive to desktop.
when file is done open riot games off desktop-League of legends. and left lol.launcher.exe and create shortcut and game should open up fully patched hope this helps people.

R041 here from Riot Games Technical Support, thank you for being patient. Typically, problems like this are caused by blocking or disturbing the Patcher from connecting to our servers to grab the files it needs. You should see the MB remaining displayed. If this number is changing then you are still patching properly. You simply need to leave the patcher open wait for the patch to complete. Here are a couple of common fixes that could help:

1. Please temporarily disable any and all Firewalls or AntiVirus applications you have running. These may block the connection between the client and server. This KB article will help you.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3

2. Are you on a Public DNS? The route may not be optimized properly, you can switch to a Public DNS by following this:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5

3. If you're on a Wireless Adapter, please be aware that playing on Wi-Fi is not a stable connection for gaming. It is prone to interference and can cause you to lose packets and increase your latency.

4. If possible, please reset your Modem and Router (This will disconnect anyone else using the network), your home network may be buffering and losing packets, this could be due to faulty Hardware or just a much needed reboot! If possible, you can also try playing League while directly connected to your modem, this will let us know if it's your router possibly having issues.

5. You may have excessive packet buffering. This can be problematic when your router or internet connection cannot handle all of the bandwidth and cause your connection to League of Legends to fail in various ways. Some third-party applications that can contribute to high buffering rates are Skype, P2P Applications such as uTorrent, Hamachi, and audio/video streams. Closing these applications may help reduce the strain on your network.

6. It couldn't hurt to try running a Clean Boot to see if any of the applications were causing problems, here's a quick guide for that: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7

If you're still experiencing problems after these instructions, I will need to see specific log files. I linked an app called HRT that will assist in gathering the logs:

Download the HRT here: https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi
Install the HRT as admin
Run the HRT from your desktop as admin
Press Start
Wait for the tests to run and attach the results (LoL Logs) as a zip folder to your response. These should be on your desktop after the test.
I'd also like to see Trace logs using a program called WinMTR. I have attached a Zip file containing the program in my reply. Simply Unzip the contents and run the x32 version, if that version does not work then use x64. In the Host field, enter in the following addresses one at a time and select Start.

192.64.170.252
104.160.131.1
Google.com

After the trace is running for 5 minutes, select Export TEXT and save the log as a text file. Run the test for both IP addresses and attach the logs to your reply. Afterwards you are safe to close the program.

As well as a Network Analysis: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq1 [Does not work on Chrome, if this does not work in other browsers, please follow the steps under 'Java Issues']

R041,
Riot Player Support
Technical Support
I sent a ticket in about a day ago because Ive had the same problem, Ill tell you guys any info they give me.

Heyo,

Sounds like there could be a conflicting program preventing it from being properly installed or run, a firewall perhaps? You may also want to check to see if you've got full admin rights and permissions, it could be the game isn't being allowed to update properly, which is why it never loads. 

To check for the proper permissions, look here and follow steps on this guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104

As for checking your firewall(s) and seeing if you have that setup properly may be wise as well:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3

Should none of that help, have you made a ticket on our help and support page?
I have the same problem, can someone please answer this? PLEASE!!!!!
